title: What will it take to get plastics out of the ocean? - Vox
body: It's an all too familiar sight around the world. Since the early 1970s, researchers have collected plastic from beaches and oceans around the globe. At the 9-mile (14-kilometer) stretch of...
readable_content:
Vox (<2023-12-08>): FILED UNDER: CLIMATE
- What will it take to get plastics out of the ocean?
- By Anja Krieger Feb 7, 2016

A few palm trees stand strong in the salty breeze... the materialized ambitions.
